about_the_game:
This DLC restores the game to its original form. It is intended only for adults who are 18 years of age or older.
It reintroduces all cut sex scenes and dialogues, as well as the cropped-out panty shots.

content_descriptors.notes:
Constant sexual humor.
Full-frontal nudity.
Large amounts of loving, consensual sex, including vaginal sex, anal sex, and oral sex.
One act of oral sex that begins with coerced, begrudging consent.
Female masturbation, including one act witnessed by the protagonist without consent.
